name: CompoundSubscriptionsProxy
description: SubscriptionsProxy handles authorization and interaction with the Subscriptions contract.

functionDecorators.name: subscribe
functionDecorators.description: Calls subscription contract and creates a DSGuard if non existent.

parameterDecorators.name: _minRatio
parameterDecorators.description: Minimum ratio below which repay is triggered.

parameterDecorators.name: _maxRatio
parameterDecorators.description: Maximum ratio after which boost is triggered.

parameterDecorators.name: _optimalRatioBoost
parameterDecorators.description: Ratio amount which boost should target.

parameterDecorators.name: _optimalRatioRepay
parameterDecorators.description: Ratio amount which repay should target.

parameterDecorators.name: _boostEnabled
parameterDecorators.description: Boolean determing if boost is enabled.

functionDecorators.name: unsubscribe
functionDecorators.description: Calls the subscription contract to unsubscribe the caller.

functionDecorators.name: update
functionDecorators.description: Calls subscription contract and updated existing parameters. If subscription is non existent this will create one.

parameterDecorators.name: _minRatio
parameterDecorators.description: Minimum ratio below which repay is triggered.

parameterDecorators.name: _maxRatio
parameterDecorators.description: Maximum ratio after which boost is triggered.

parameterDecorators.name: _optimalRatioBoost
parameterDecorators.description: Ratio amount which boost should target.

parameterDecorators.name: _optimalRatioRepay
parameterDecorators.description: Ratio amount which repay should target.

parameterDecorators.name: _boostEnabled
parameterDecorators.description: Boolean determing if boost is enabled.
